attributes.action: Legislate supermarket refrigerator design to save energy
attributes.additional_details: Please drive supermarkets to invest in doors so that they can save money and take pressure off the grid. This would also create a better working environment for staff.
attributes.background: UK supermarkets waste a lot of energy by not having doors on their refrigerated shelves. Rather than refrigerating only the food, the entire space is refrigerated.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631967
